Nils Wyss

nils@ardevia.ch

I enjoy working on tasks in a team and sharing my experiences and insights with others. With flexible working hours and unusual working conditions, I have no problems. I can stay focused on a task for a long time without losing my head. I don't avoid problems and rather see them as a new challenge to develop myself further. With me you gain an employee who carries out his duty in a timely, careful and precise manner.
